name: DL Ultimate Custom ScrollBar
author: DynamicLayers

sections.description:
Using DL Ultimate Custom ScrollBar for customize scrollbar, you get a very elegant and unique site. Consistent scroll behavior for every device. You can change scrollbar size, colors, animation, position from this settings page.

Plugin Features

  • Simple installation & activation
  • Supported touch devices.
  • Unlimited colors.
  • Lightweight.
  • Enable/Disable Option.
  • Easy Option Panel.
  • All Modern browser supported

Options

  • Enable/Disable ScrollBar : You can enable or disable scrollbar using this option.
  • Enable/Disable ScrollBar for Mobile : You can enable or disable scrollbar using this option for mobile devices.
  • Cursor Width : You can increase or decrease cursor width using this option.
  • Rail Background Color : You can change rail background color from this color picker.
  • Cursor Color : You can change cursor color from this color picker.
  • Auto Hide Mode : You can select scrollbar auto hide mode from this selectbox.
  • Cursor Border : You can control cursor border using this option.
  • Cursor Border Radius : You can control cursor border radius using this option.
  • Scroll Speed : You can control scroll speed using this option.
  • Mouse Scroll Step : You can control mouse scroll step using this option.
  • Minimum Cursor Height : You can set the minimum cursor height.
  • Z-Index : You can set zIndex of the scrollbar using this option.
sections.installation: 1. Unzip the downloaded dl-ultimate-custom-scrollbar.zip file and upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install the DL Ultimate Custom ScrollBar by DynamicLayers plugin from WordPress repository. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activate plugin you will see “DL ScrollBar Options” menu under the “Settings” menu.
